display.title: Spray Can
description: Unfortunately, this is only an &&lEmpty&&r Spray Can, which you have to fill with Chemical Dye before using.
&&aSpray Cans&&r do not provide any functionality involving machines, but can be quite &&bvisually appealing and useful&&r!

Any &&7(or almost any)&&r GregTech tile entity &&7(machine, pipe, cable...)&&r can be &&6painted&&r to one of the 16 colors of your choosing. This is great for screenshots, or to separate different setups for convenience in a Multiplayer base. They also help with distinguishing between pipelines and cables.
Holding the &&aSpray Can&&r in the offhand will automatically paint any block you place.
